input_prompt: Create board deck with 3 basic financial

dimensionContent.Name: Direct Staff costs salaries and wages
Realized Foreign exchange gains and losses
STOCK WRITE OFF- Damaged/shop use/write off
Other Income from Petsville Luxury Others
Affiliate Service Fees (Instashop, El Grocer etc....)
Other Income from Petsville Luxury Electricity and Cooling
Profits on Sales of Fixed Assets
Inventory Adjmt. (Effect of Physical Count & Jnl.)
Inventory Adjsutment - effect of stock take
Stock Write Off  - Old Display Model
Nishe Services for VAT and Corp. Tax

ExistingLists.CreateDescription: A list of the last 12 months to be used on the x-axis of the chart.
Create a list including two series: one for Actuals and one for 'Forecast Jun'
A list with Actual, Budget, and Variance columns to be used on table columns, providing a comparison between actual and budgeted financials.
Create a list showing Actuals, Budget, and Variance
Create a two-column comparison showing Actuals and Forecast for June.
Create a list with Actual, Forecast, and Last Year metrics for bar chart visualization.
A list with Actuals, Budget, and a Variance bar to be used on table columns.
Create a list of series showing Forecast Jun to Actual for the waterfall chart.
Create a list showing Forecast Jun to Actual metrics for waterfall chart.
Create a list for store locations as category axis.
Create a list showing the columns Budget25, Forecast, Act24, and Act25. Ensure they are clearly formatted for a side-by-side comparison.
Create a list displaying 'Contribution Margin' KPIs, formatted
Create a list displaying 'Gross Margin' KPIs neatly formatted
A list of all months in the current year to be used on table columns.
Create a list of account categories till EBITDA, keeping hierarchical structure.
A list with locations as the main dimension and columns for current year, budget, forecast, and prior year to be used on table columns.
A list containing net income to be used on the y-axis of the chart.
